TestDescription.name: vBulletin 5 CONNECT remote code execution
TestDescription.Description: vBulletin (vB) is a proprietary Internet forum software package developed by vBulletin Solutions, Inc. A vulnerability exists in vBulletin 5 CONNECT (versions 5.1.19 and bellow) that may allow an attacker to execute arbitrary PHP code via an unsafe unserialize() call.
TestDescription.Impact: A malicious user may execute arbitrary PHP code.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Upgrade to the latest version of vBulletin.

Reference.database: Security Patch Release for vBulletin 5 Connect (Versions 5.1.4, through 5.1.9)
